text: The bluefinned butterfish (Odax cyanoallix) is a species of marine ray-finned fish, a weed whiting from the family Odacidae. It is found in shallow reef areas where brown seaweed is abundant. == Related pages == * Greenbone * Odacidae == References == # Froese, Rainer; Pauly, Daniel (eds.) (2014). "Odax cyanoallix" in FishBase. February 2014 version. Category:Labriformes
title: Bluefinned butterfish
